column5: Got in sale an ICom handled VHF marine transceiver: IC-M92DI am trying to register a MMSI # via internet here:http://www.ic.gc.ca/eic/site/smt-gst.nsf/eng/sf08138.htmlIs this the correct link to register my device.Thank you for any advice in this mater.
Looks like the right one, but sooner or later I sure you'll need the radio licence.

Looks like the right one, but sooner or later I sure you'll need the radio licence.  Don't really need the license any more unless using it in other countries. Even then I wouldn't bother.  https://www.tc.gc.ca/eng/marinesafety/oep-navigation-radiocomms-faqs-1489.htm
Ya, licence was the wrong choice, radio operator certificate is what I meant.
Your local Canadian Power Squadron will be having a radio coarse to get you set up.
